title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Strategies for Enhancing a Sense of Belonging in Advanced Online Language Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Graduate-level language learning fundamentals and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners build a network with peer learners through meaningful interactions at least three times per week in online discussion forums
Instructors maintain response rates of over 85% to learner-specific content via asynchronous feedback systems
Learners measure and report changes in a sense of belonging in online environments using a three-level scale (self-assessment) through weekly reflective journals
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
